title: This case is outta this world! - System76 Nebula49
description: Check out the EPIC MSI Holiday Deals and save big on laptops at:   System76 is known for their Linux-based laptops and desktops, but today we're checking out their new Nebula49 case! Featuring a sleek, black design with a space-themed front accent, built-in ducting, and a great power button, will Plouffe be impressed or should you get something a bit more down-to-Earth?   Check out the System78 Nebula49:  Buy an AMD Ryzen 7 7800X3D CPU:  Buy a GIGABYTE X670 Aorus Elite AX Motherboard:  Buy a Noctua NH-D12L CPU Cooler:  Buy a MSI Ventus 3X GeForce RTX 4070 CPU:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Who's System76? 0:50 Design impressions 3:40 Checking out the insides + wind tunnel 5:59 Sponsor - MSI 6:18 Building in the case 12:33 Overall thoughts and pricing 13:08 Outro
